goal.ch:
"修完本課程，學生應能
1.整理研究資料並有條理的組織科技相關的演說內容；
2.應用英語簡報技巧，流暢且得體的以英語進行科技演講與簡報;
3.了解多元演說素材及科技職場文化，順利結合所學與職場實境，並展現人文素養；
4.溝通與觀摩中，增強溝通能力，並拓展人際脈絡。"
goal.en:
"The students will be able to
1. organize presentation materials effectively.
2. apply presentation skills and give effective presentations.
3. understand culture differences in the workplace
4. improve interpersonal communication skills."

gradMethod.ch:
"1. 出席(10%)
2. 週作業和課堂參與(20%)
3. 週演說(30%)
4. 期中、期末簡報(40%)：每次演說佔20%
各項之規定與要求請見以下英文說明

** 第一堂未到課的學生須在課前或於課後24小時內提出請假證明，否則將由課務系統強制退選。"
gradMethod.en:
"1. Attendance (10%): Classes are mandatory. For each class-hour absence 2 points will be deducted from the final grade. A medical leave requires proof of medical care. All other excused leaves also require proof. All students are expected to attend class on time. For each tardiness 1 point will be deducted. Absence of more than 5 class-hours will result in a failing grade for the course. Please be noted that students who miss the first class will not be allowed to take this course.
2. Weekly assignments and Class participation (20%): Students are expected to prepare for and participate in class activities. 
3. Weekly Mini-talks (30%): Students will be required to do homework and prepare for a mini-talk every week.
4. Mid-term and Final Presentations (40%): There are two major speeches for this course, each accounting for 20% of the final grade. Both presentations centers around the speaker‘s field of study."
